tool_description: You can find live Cric-info sports news,
name: Live Sports News
title: Live Sports News

api_list.name: Get news by category id
Get all news
Get category by id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-sports-news.p.rapidapi.com/categories/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-sports-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-sports-news.p.rapidapi.com/categories/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-sports-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
